summary: An insanely, egocentric ventriloquist, even though he is possessed by his wooden dummy, is in love with a dancer who is in love with another. The dummy gives advice to the ventriloquist.
cast: Erich von Stroheim|Betty Compson|Donald Douglas|Marjorie Kane|George Grandee|John F. Hamilton|Harry Ross|Marbeth Wright
keywords: character name as title|three word title|psychotronic film|ventriloquist dummy|ventriloquist
director: Directors: James Cruze, Erich von Stroheim (uncredited)
title: El otro yo
